maml:description.maml:para: Add a tag to a machine.
Add a tag to a machine in Defender for Endpoint.
The ID or the FQDN of the machine.
The name of the tag to add.
The ID or the FQDN of the machine.
The name of the tag to add.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Add-DatpMachineTag -MachineId "comp-01.contoso.com" -TagName "TestTag-01"

dev:remarks.maml:para: Add a tag to the machine 'comp-01.contoso.com' with the name 'TestTag-01'.

maml:description.maml:para: Connect to the Defender for Endpoint API.

Get an alert or alerts from Defender for Endpoint.

The ID of an alert generated by Defender for Endpoint.
The current status of the alerts to get.
The ID of an alert generated by Defender for Endpoint.
The current status of the alerts to get.
